::KitKat::

She contacted Detructor on his link. "Tell the leader of the trainers 
to see me.  I have a plan for them.  If he refuses, then tell him 
that he has lost the war unless he comes and talks to me."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>   Destructor shivered when he heard that. "Alright I have faith in 
you. Any 
> way if we are able to get the Trainers away from here. Then I have 
to fix the 
> ark which will take a while. I will not return in a while."
